overview:
With a 20-year career in online and entertainment media. Matt O’Malley has numerous Web analytic patents to his name. He specializes in optimizing real-time customer data, knowledge and feedback services and platforms for the mobile industry.

Matt was among the first to monetize social media networks as chief operating officer of NextTV and D.A.V.E. Networks, which created video portal websites for companies including Disney, CBS, Endemol, Fremantle, and HP.

He also served as chief executive officer of Adegy, an incubator for innovative technologies including Youscoverâ€™s micro-segmentation process. While at Adegy, Matt drove projects including the development of a unique kiosk user interface for a robotic vending machine, the first build-to-order laptop purchasing system for X2, and the China Trade Summit and VentureFest competition in Beijing.

Previously, he was chief executive officer of TelAbout, an interactive-marketing platform for retailers, manufacturers and shoppers to exchange information via mobile phones, websites and kiosks.

In the early 1990s he held a variety of production positions at major networks including CBS, NBC and E! Entertainment. His credits include participating in the E! Network launch and developing popular shows including Fantasy Football Weekly and the More than a Game syndicated series.
